title: AI Video & Banner Creator
job_overview:
???? About Us:

We are a fast-growing mobile app company developing utility-based iOS applications with millions of downloads worldwide. We run large-scale user acquisition campaigns on Facebook and Google, and we’re looking for a creative mind to join our team and help produce high-performing ad creatives using AI-powered tools.

???? What You’ll Be Doing:
 • Create engaging banners and video ads for Facebook Ads and Google Upgrade to see actual info campaigns
 • Use AI tools to speed up creative production
 • Edit, optimize, and adapt creatives to fit various formats and placements
 • Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm new concepts and test ideas
 • Analyze performance of creatives and improve based on results

???? What We’re Looking For:
 • Strong creative eye and understanding of visual storytelling
 • Experience creating ads (static & video) for mobile apps
 • Familiarity with AI design/video tools
 • Basic understanding of performance marketing (CTR, CVR, etc.) – big advantage
 • Ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and iterate quickly
 • Bonus: Experience in iOS app marketing or working with UA teams


???? Why Work With Us:
 • Work remotely with flexible hours
 • Join a fast-moving team with global reach
 • Get exposure to millions of users and real ad performance feedback
 • Long-term opportunity with growth potential
